title: Those Pearly Gates
description: Leaving her late husband's beloved farmhouse to move into her new husband's parsonage, Imogene Lavender struggles with her new identity as a reverend's wife, incites the wrath of her resentful niece, and witnesses her daughter's rebelliousness in the wake of the latter's own marriage to a clergyman. Original. 25,000 first printing.
author: Julie L. Cannon
